Cuomo threatens to shut down Manhattan, Hamptons again if coronavirus social-distancing rules broken Gov. Andrew Cuomo on Sunday reprimanded New Yorkers for breaking coronavirus social-distancing rules, threatening to shut down Manhattan and the Hamptons again.

Kudlow says it's 'probably' good idea for Trump supporters to wear masks to Oklahoma rally Larry Kudlow, the director of the National Economic Council and one of President Trump’s closest allies, said on Sunday that people attending Trump’s rally in Tulsa, Ok, next weekend should “probably” wear a mask to prevent more coronavirus infections.

Newt Gingrich: Testing won't help fight coronavirus unless we do this One of the biggest advancements we’ve seen during the coronavirus pandemic crisis is the development of rapid, on-site tests for COVID-19. Thanks to this innovation, the turnaround time for such tests has been reduced from one week to one hour or less.
